description: ATLAS AI Agent is a powerful, autonomous AI agent that goes beyond simple chatbots, acting as a digital colleague to perform complex tasks from idea level to delivery with minimal human oversight. It handles research, data analysis, content creation, coding, and automation using multiple AI models and its own persistent memory for complex workflows like trip planning or market research.
capabilities: ATLAS AI Agent combines advanced reasoning, persistent memory, and multi-model orchestration to handle end-to-end workflows. It autonomously breaks down complex tasks, conducts research, analyzes data, generates content, writes code, and delivers comprehensive solutions with minimal human intervention. The system learns from each interaction, building a knowledge base that enhances future performance across diverse domains.

description: ATLAS Code-Agent is an advanced AI-powered coding assistant that transforms the software development lifecycle. It provides intelligent code generation, real-time debugging, automated testing, code review, and refactoring capabilities across multiple programming languages and frameworks.
capabilities: ATLAS Code-Agent leverages advanced language models trained on billions of lines of code to provide context-aware coding assistance. It understands project architecture, coding standards, and best practices to generate production-ready code, identify potential issues, suggest optimizations, and automate repetitive development tasks. The agent supports 40+ programming languages and integrates seamlessly with popular IDEs and development tools.

description: ATLAS Smartglass Agent represents the future of hands-free computing, combining AI-powered augmented reality with wearable technology. These intelligent smart glasses provide real-time information overlay, voice-controlled AI assistance, hands-free capture, and immersive AR experiences for both personal and professional use.
capabilities: ATLAS Smartglass Agent seamlessly blends the physical and digital worlds through advanced AR technology. The system uses computer vision and AI to identify objects, translate text, provide contextual information, and enable hands-free communication. With high-quality camera capture, immersive audio, and intuitive gesture controls via neural wristband, users can access information, capture moments, and collaborate remotely without interrupting their workflow. The glasses support prescription lenses and offer up to 8 hours of continuous use.

description: ATLAS AI Video Analytics is a comprehensive computer vision platform that provides real-time video analysis, face recognition, multimodal biometric identification, and advanced object detection. Powered by YOLO object detection and deep learning models, it delivers accurate, fast, and scalable video intelligence for security, safety, and operational efficiency.
capabilities: ATLAS AI Video Analytics leverages state-of-the-art deep learning models to process video streams at 155+ FPS with industry-leading accuracy. The platform supports multimodal biometric identification (face, iris, fingerprint), enabling secure authentication across multiple touchpoints. YOLO-powered object detection provides real-time identification of objects, people, vehicles, and anomalies with 95%+ accuracy. Advanced features include facial expression recognition, behavior analysis, crowd counting, and predictive threat detection. The system scales from single cameras to city-wide networks with centralized management.

description: ATLAS BOX is a compact, powerful edge computing device designed for AI-driven applications, video analytics, and high-quality video recording. This independent edge device brings AI processing directly to the source, enabling real-time decision-making without cloud dependency, perfect for remote locations, security installations, and IoT deployments.
capabilities: ATLAS BOX combines powerful edge AI processing with professional-grade video recording capabilities in a ruggedized, compact form factor. The device runs advanced AI models locally for real-time video analytics, object detection, and decision-making without requiring constant cloud connectivity. It supports multiple camera inputs, 4K recording, and intelligent video compression to maximize storage efficiency. With industrial-grade components rated for extreme temperatures (-20°C to 60°C), ATLAS BOX operates reliably in challenging environments. The system includes remote management, OTA updates, and seamless integration with cloud platforms for hybrid deployments.
